nodes.name: TokenFarm

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function will let investor stake their DAI tokens to the contract.
 @param _amount The total amount transferred by the investor.
nodes.name: stakeTokens

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function will reward DApp tokens to the investors for staking mDAI tokens.
 @dev Only the owner of tokenFarm contract can call this function.
nodes.name: issueTokens

nodes.documentation: @notice The investor can withdraw their mDAI tokens through unstaking them.
nodes.name: unstakeToken

attributes.name: TokenFarm

attributes.documentation:
@notice This function will let investor stake their DAI tokens to the contract.
 @param _amount The total amount transferred by the investor.
attributes.name: stakeTokens

attributes.documentation:
@notice This function will reward DApp tokens to the investors for staking mDAI tokens.
 @dev Only the owner of tokenFarm contract can call this function.
attributes.name: issueTokens

attributes.documentation: @notice The investor can withdraw their mDAI tokens through unstaking them.
attributes.name: unstakeToken

devdoc.author: Pritesh Kadiwala

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

issueTokens().details: Only the owner of tokenFarm contract can call this function.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._amount: The total amount transferred by the investor.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: A contract for a token yeild farm

methods.constructor: The constructor will run once when the contract is deployed.         It is to initialize the Dapp and Dai token instances.

issueTokens().notice: This function will reward DApp tokens to the investors for staking mDAI tokens.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

stakeTokens(uint256).notice: This function will let investor stake their DAI tokens to the contract.

unstakeToken().notice: The investor can withdraw their mDAI tokens through unstaking them.

userdoc.notice: For now, this contract takes in a Mock DAI         and the investor yeilds a DApp Token by farming.
